/*

//imports are inserted at the beginning

import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react'
import axios from 'axios'

interface IDatabase {
    title: string;
}

//function are inserted after the main function

 const [database, setDatabase] = useState<IDatabase[]>( [] );

      useEffect(() => {
          const axiosDatabase = async () => {
              const response = await axios('http://localhost:3000/database');
              setDatabase(response.data);
          };
          axiosDatabase()
      }, []);

*/
